description:
Zoro still can’t gain control of Enma which keeps extracting his Haki. Backed into a corner by the formidable King, Zoro remembers the encounter with an old man in his hometown when he was a child.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Geheimnis von Enma! – Das verfluchte Schwert, das Zorro anvertraut wurde
Enma no Himitsu! Zoro ni Takusareshi Youtou
Le secret d`Enma. Zoro hérite d`une lame maudite !
The Secret of Enma! The Cursed Sword Entrusted to Zoro
閻魔の秘密! ゾロに託されし妖刀
